main.description: List economicResources. Filterable by: containedIn, contains, primaryAccountable, stage.

uri.description: Fetch a single record by AT-URI. Other filters are ignored when set.

containedIn.description: Filter where containedIn array contains this AT-URI.

contains.description: Filter where contains array contains this AT-URI.

primaryAccountable.description: Filter by primaryAccountable (DID of referenced agent).

stage.description: Filter by stage (AT-URI of referenced record).

limit.description: Maximum number of records to return.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor from a previous response.
